title: Thurs Post show (07-14-22)
itunes:title: Thurs Post show (07-14-22)
description:
Bobby starts by sharing a crazy story about a guy who tried to kidnap his ex-girlfriend from 20 years ago. We also talk about what we’d do in a situation where there is an emergency on a plane: would you help or would you save yourself? Bobby gives you a way to still get pre-sale tickets for his upcoming comedy shows. Bobby shares how he got so good at reading prompters.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
